entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to rain near noon. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Periods of rain beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
